description: Examines 'Potential and Paradoxes' of AI, exploring how artificial intelligence can both help and complicate sustainability efforts. Promotes critical thinking about AI technology, examines societal implications, and explores ethical dimensions of technological progress in sustainability context. Targets UN SDG 9 (Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure), SDG 13 (Climate Action), and SDG 4 (Quality Education).
additionalFiles: Grupperapport_ Prosjekt Vision Shift - Potensial og Paradokser.pdf
